name: Dogs
aditionalInfo: By connecting with dogs, I've learned to be empathetic and kind, taking on the responsibility of their care.

Their loyalty has taught me to be devoted and steadfast in relationships.Through training and understanding, I've developed patience, and their protective nature has instilled in me a sense of safeguarding others.

name: Board games
aditionalInfo: Engaging in board games hones my ability to effectively convey strategies, connect with others, and negotiate. It sharpens my critical thinking skills, allowing me to analyze game states, evaluate options, and anticipate consequences.

Collaborative games emphasize teamwork, fostering my collaborative skills and teaching me to listen and find synergies. Board games also enhance problem-solving abilities, encouraging creative and analytical thinking.

name: Scuba Diving
aditionalInfo: Through diving, I have embraced responsibility in safety protocols and equipment checks ingrained in the diving culture and the importance of meticulous preparation and attention to detail.

I have become an advocate for conservation and sustainable practices both in and out of the water as the fragility of the underwater ecosystem nurtures a deep sense of environmental awareness within me.
Diving also hones my organizational skills as I meticulously plan dive trips, manage gear, and navigate complex dive sites.
The diving community provides me with opportunities for leadership, whether it's leading dive groups, participating in rescue scenarios, or sharing knowledge with fellow divers.

name: Music
aditionalInfo: Through music, I have learned the value of concentration, which allowed me to convey and explore a wide range of feelings, fostering emotional intelligence and self-awareness.
Furthermore, music has nurtured my empathy by enabling me to connect with the emotions and experiences conveyed by different compositions.
Music fuels my creativity, encouraging me to think outside the box, explore new possibilities, and express myself in unique ways.

name: Travel
aditionalInfo: Through my travels, I have cultivated a strong sense of autonomy, as navigating new environments, planning itineraries, and making independent decisions have become second nature.

It also fosters adaptability, as I encounter diverse cultures, customs, and languages. Exploring different places has expanded my perspective, allowing me to appreciate the beauty of diversity and gain a deeper understanding of the world and its people.
I have built resilience, learning to overcome obstacles, handle unexpected challenges, and thrive outside my comfort zone.

name: Paint
aditionalInfo: Engaging in painting nurtures my creativity, as I immerse myself in the artistic process, paying attention to details and intricacies. Moreover, painting has taught me persistence, as I embrace the challenges that arise and strive to improve with each stroke, understanding that progress takes time.
Beyond the artistic aspect, painting serves as a source of relaxation, offering a meditative and therapeutic outlet where I can express myself and find solace.
